# Human Resources Consultant - Senior Level

## Tender Notice Reference Number

 cb-5363-69790173

## Description

Transport Canada (TC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Senior Human Resources Consultant to assist the Marine Safety and Security (MSS) branch in implementing its multi-year action plan to address recruitment and retention challenges related to technical inspectors.

## Expiration Date

Tender closing date has been extended to provide proponents with additional time to prepare their proposals. The new deadline is **June 1, 2023 at 2:00 pm EDT**.

## Scope of Work

The selected contractor will be responsible for undertaking the entire scope of work and providing deliverables to implement the multi-year action plan. The estimated level of effort for this requirement is up to 180 days, with a completion deadline of **March 31, 2025** at the latest.

## Technical Specifications

### Unspsc Description

 Human resources consulting service

### Procurement Category

 SRV

### Selection Criteria

 Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

 Specific trade agreements are listed above. The successful bidder may be required to provide additional information on their trade agreement status.

## Procurement Details

### Contact Information

For more information on the tender process, please contact Fanie Charron, Email: [fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca](mailto:fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca), Phone: (343) 574-8173.

### Tender Documents

 Formatted documents may be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Attachment

 The solicitation package is attached to this notice and may be accessed via the above link.

# Contact 

If you need more information about the assignment, you can reach me directly at  [fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca](mailto:fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca),  (343) 574-8173, or come to the office.

# Regions Covered 

This invitation is being made by Transport Canada and  regions in Canada are impacted. Therefore, please read sections 5 and 6 for any protocol to be followed.
